5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: ‘Abdullah bin Sa’d said:“I asked the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ): ‘Which is better prayer in my house or prayer in the mosque?’ He said: ‘Do you not see how close my house is to the mosque?’ But praying in my house is dearer to me than praying in the mosque, apart from the prescribed prayers.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي التَّطَوُّعِ فِي الْبَيْتِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning voluntary Prayers offered at home
